Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
To check out the latest OpenCms version from GitHub via Eclipse, open Eclipse and:

  • Choose "File" -> "Import ..." -> "Git" -> "Projects from Git"
  • Click "Next" and select "Clone URI"
  • Set "https://github.com/alkacon/opencms-core.git" as URI and click "Next"
  • Select a branch and click "Next"
  • Select "Use the New Project wizard"
  • Uncheck "Use default location" and enter the repository's path as location
  • Click "Finish"
